author: Paul Hodgson
content: Outstanding quality and quantity. Got there at quarter past 4 on Monday on our way to the Iron Maiden concert. A full, and I mean full, plate of 4 curries with rice for Â£5.50. It's no frills but it doesn't need any, the food speaks for itself. Quite tricky to find, but worth persevering for.  I'll be back.
